about_the_game:
JetTurbo is a Hoverboard racing game made by fans of the Hoverboard racing genre. Ride, Perform Tricks, and Become the embodiment of Speed for thrill and glory in this Sci-Fi rush!

🎮 Dive into the dynamic world of JetTurbo and experience the thrill of racing with a twist! Unleash your inner racer and explore the unique charm of JetTurbo's Playable New Original Characters, each crafted in homage to iconic Art Styles that redefine the racing genre.

🏁 Kickstart your journey by tackling the Basic Track – a canvas for you to showcase your piloting prowess and strategic finesse. Master the art of precision as you navigate through twists and turns, demonstrating your Skills in a symphony of speed and strategy.

🎢 Elevate your gameplay to a new level by executing jaw-dropping Tricks that not only dazzle your opponents but also fuel your Style, Speed, and XP. In JetTurbo, every maneuver counts, and it's time to prove that you're not just a racer – you're an artist of the track.

🏆 Need some practice before dominating the competition? Engage in the immersive Practice Mode, where you can fine-tune your technique and perfect those Awe-Inspiring Moves that will set you apart. Get ready to unleash your full potential and conquer the courses like a true champion.

🌐 The true essence of JetTurbo lies in its Online mode, where the action goes global. Challenge and Compete with Friends and other racers from around the world in heart-pounding races that blend skill and style in a breathtaking display of talent. Race against your peers and rise to the top of the leaderboards – your destiny as the ultimate racer awaits!

⏱️ Prove your supremacy on the track by embarking on exhilarating Time Trials. Show the world that you're not just better – you're in a league of your own. Leave competitors in your wake as you set new records and establish yourself as the reigning champion.

🌍 The Online Leaderboard is where legends are made. Showcase your dominance to the WORLD, asserting your position as the unrivaled master of JetTurbo. With every triumph, you etch your name in history and leave an indelible mark on the racing landscape.

Are you ready to redefine racing and showcase your unparalleled skills? Join us in JetTurbo and leave an artistic trail of victory that the world won't soon forget!

legal_notice:
JetTurbo is owned, created, and supported by BGNB Studios and Velocity Interactive
Do not redistribute, share, or create copies of our product(s)
name: JetTurbo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220/Athlon II X4 638 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 1GB, AMD Radeon RX 560 2GB equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 4GB, AMD Radeon RX 590 4GB equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: JetTurbo is a Hoverboard racing game made by fans of the Hoverboard racing genre. Ride, Perform Tricks, and Become the embodiment of Speed for thrill and glory in this Sci-Fi rush!
